statements: SELECT * FROM healthcare_billing;
SELECT billing_id, billing_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT patient_id, due_date FROM healthcare_billing WHERE billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_billing WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT billing_id, billing_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE due_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM healthcare_billing WHERE payment_status = 'PAID';
SELECT billing_id, billing_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE patient_id = 123 ORDER BY due_date DESC;
SELECT MAX(billing_amount) AS max_billing_amount, MIN(billing_amount) AS min_billing_amount FROM healthcare_billing;
SELECT * FROM healthcare_billing WHERE payment_status = 'PENDING' AND billing_amount > 1000 ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT AVG(billing_amount) AS avg_billing_amount FROM healthcare_billing WHERE payment_status = 'PAID';
SELECT * FROM billing_information;
SELECT patient_id, billing_date, amount FROM billing_information WHERE payment_status = 'Paid';
SELECT patient_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM billing_information GROUP BY patient_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM payment_history WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT patient_id) AS unique_patients FROM payment_history;
SELECT * FROM billing_information WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT billing_date, amount FROM billing_information ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM billing_information GROUP BY patient_id;
SELECT p.patient_id, p.payment_date, b.billing_date FROM payment_history p INNER JOIN billing_information b ON p.patient_id = b.patient_id;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payment_history WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Robotics_Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Healthcare_Robotics_Patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT service_name, service_cost FROM Healthcare_Robotics_Services ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT patient_name, service_name, payment_amount FROM Healthcare_Robotics_Payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Robotics_Patients JOIN Healthcare_Robotics_Payments ON Healthcare_Robotics_Patients.patient_id = Healthcare_Robotics_Payments.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM Healthcare_Robotics_Patients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM Healthcare_Robotics_Patients WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT service_name, service_description, service_cost FROM Healthcare_Robotics_Services WHERE service_cost > 100;

SELECT patient_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Healthcare_Robotics_Patients JOIN Healthcare_Robotics_Payments ON Healthcare_Robotics_Patients.patient_id = Healthcare_Robotics_Payments.patient_id WHERE payment_amount >= 500;

SELECT patient_name, service_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM Healthcare_Robotics_Patients JOIN Healthcare_Robotics_Payments ON Healthcare_Robotics_Patients.patient_id = Healthcare_Robotics_Payments.patient_id JOIN Healthcare_Robotics_Services ON Healthcare_Robotics_Payments.service_id = Healthcare_Robotics_Services.service_id WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob FROM PatientInformation ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT billing_id, billing_amount, billing_date FROM BillingInformation WHERE billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT patient_name, patient_gender FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentInformation ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM BillingInformation;
SELECT billing_id, billing_amount FROM BillingInformation WHERE billing_amount > 1000;
SELECT patient_name, patient_dob, patient_gender FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM PaymentInformation ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT patient_name, billing_amount, payment_amount FROM PatientInformation JOIN BillingInformation ON PatientInformation.patient_id = BillingInformation.patient_id JOIN PaymentInformation ON BillingInformation.billing_id = PaymentInformation.billing_id;
SELECT * FROM Billing ORDER BY billing_id DESC;
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM Patient WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT service_description, amount FROM Billing WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer, model FROM Robot WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT hospital_name, address, phone_number FROM Hospital ORDER BY hospital_id;
SELECT * FROM Billing WHERE billing_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM Patient ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, service_description, amount FROM Billing WHERE amount > 1000.00 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT R.robot_name, R.manufacturer, H.hospital_name FROM Robot R JOIN Hospital H ON R.robot_id = H.hospital_id;
SELECT P.first_name, P.last_name, B.amount_paid FROM Patient P JOIN Payment B ON P.patient_id = B.billing_id WHERE B.amount_paid < 500.00;
